channel.description: Troubleshooting Common Scenarios Apart from the problems that may arise in playbooks, another type of error relates to connectivity issues. To connect to managed hosts, SSH must be configured correctly, and also authentication and privilege escalation must work as expected. Analyzing Connectivity Issues To be able to connect to a managed host, you need to have an IP network connection. Apart from that, you need to make sure that the host has been set up correctly:
